<<<<<<< HEAD
Core.EscapeInvalidTags
TYPE: bool
DEFAULT: false
--DESCRIPTION--
When true, invalid tags will be written back to the document as plain text.
Otherwise, they are silently dropped.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
=======
Core.EscapeInvalidTags
TYPE: bool
DEFAULT: false
--DESCRIPTION--
When true, invalid tags will be written back to the document as plain text.
Otherwise, they are silently dropped.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
